title: How much did the invention of the television change society? - Quora

response.answer_text: Television has brought tremendous change in society because is’t use does not discriminate. It brings the same information into every household no matter the socio-economic situation. Prior to tv consumers had little knowledge of what was available to purchase. Now they were hearing and seeing the Dinah Shore jingle “ See the USA in your Chevrolet, America is asking you to call.” It has been the big mover in the materialistic world.
